mechanics.condition: Touch a length of rope up to 60 feet long
mechanics.outcome: Rope rises, and an invisible entrance opens to an extradimensional space at its upper end

mechanics.condition: Creature climbs to the top of the rope
mechanics.outcome: Creature can enter the extradimensional space

mechanics.condition: Creature is Medium size or smaller
mechanics.outcome: The space can hold a maximum of eight such creatures

mechanics.condition: Rope is pulled into the space
mechanics.outcome: The rope disappears from view outside the space

mechanics.trigger: Attack or spell targeting the space
mechanics.condition: Attack or spell attempts to cross the entrance into the extradimensional space
mechanics.outcome: Attacks and spells cannot cross into the extradimensional space

mechanics.trigger: Attack or spell cast from the space
mechanics.condition: Attack or spell attempts to cross the entrance out of the extradimensional space
mechanics.outcome: Attacks and spells cannot cross out of the extradimensional space

mechanics.trigger: Creature inside the space attempting to see outside
mechanics.outcome: Creatures inside can see out as if through a 3-foot-by-5-foot window centered on the rope
Anything inside the extradimensional space drops out

description_text: You touch a length of rope that is up to 60 feet long. One end of the rope then rises into the air until the whole rope hangs perpendicular to the ground. At the upper end of the rope, an invisible entrance opens to an extradimensional space that lasts until the spell ends. The extradimensional space can be reached by climbing to the top of the rope. The space can hold as many as eight Medium or smaller creatures. The rope can be pulled into the space, making the rope disappear from view outside the space. Attacks and spells can't cross through the entrance into or out of the extradimensional space, but those inside can see out of it as if through a 3-foot-by-5-foot window centered on the rope. Anything inside the extradimensional space drops out when the spell ends.
